day.description: Gets the day of week name e.g. 'Saturday'

active.description: True to filter only active appointments

glazeable.description: Whether the product is glazeable or not.

id.description: Gets or inits the review id

branchId.description: Gets or inits the branch id this review is for

appointmentTypeId.description: Gets or inits the appointment type id this review is for

appointmentTypeOnlineName.description: Gets the appointment type online name this review is for.

reviewDate.description: Gets or inits the review date

firstName.description: Gets or inits frist nanme of the person completing the review

lastName.description: Gets or inits last nanme of the person completing the review

reviewAnswer.description: Gets or inits the review answer

rating.description: Gets or inits the review rating

score.description: Gets or inits the primary NPS score

branchId.description: Gets or Sets branch ID for what appointment types should be returned.

excludeGlobalAppointmentTypes.description: Gets or sets if appointment types unassigned from any branch should be returned.

onlyAvailableOnlineAppointmentTypes.description: Gets or sets if only appointment types that are available online should be returned.

includeEventTypes.description: Gets or sets the event types to return.

brandingId.description:
Branding ID to filter by if needed: empty guid would reflect wanting to return the branches
with group level branding (which is null in the db) as opposed to leaving this null if want
all branches regardless of branding ID

branchIdFilter.description: Gets or sets a collection of branch ids to filter results by

prices.description: The list of SKUs and their prices

productId.description: The ID of the product in question as GUID

variantId.description: The ID of the SKU when requesting a product type that has SKU management as a GUID

branchId.description: The Id of the Branch as GUID

productTypeId.description: The Id of the product type (Sunglasses, Frames, CL, etc.) as GUID

retailPrice.description: The retail price of the product.

branchStocks.description: List of branch related stock levels

modifiedDay.description: Last modified day of the sku

supplierCode.description: The supplier code of the sku.

bookInReason.description: The book in reason. Only accepts Online_Return

bookOutReason.description: The book out reason. Only accepts Online_Sale

quantity.description: The quantity to increase / decrease by
